thread.title: BRIEF-Nasdaq Announces End-Of Month Open Short Interest Positions In Nasdaq Stocks As Of Settlement Date March 29, 2018

title: BRIEF-Nasdaq Announces End-Of Month Open Short Interest Positions In Nasdaq Stocks As Of Settlement Date March 29, 2018
text:
Market News April 10, 2018 / 8:14 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Nasdaq Announces End-Of Month Open Short Interest Positions In Nasdaq Stocks As Of Settlement Date March 29, 2018 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 10 (Reuters) - Nasdaq Inc: 
* NASDAQ ANNOUNCES END-OF-MONTH OPEN SHORT INTEREST POSITIONS IN NASDAQ STOCKS AS OF SETTLEMENT DATE MARCH 29, 2018 
* AT END OF SETTLEMENT DATE OF MARCH 29, SHORT INTEREST IN 2,335 NASDAQ GLOBAL MARKET SECURITIES TOTALED 7.18 BILLION SHARES 
* SHORT INTEREST IN ALL 3,219 NASDAQ SECURITIES TOTALED 8.16 BILLION SHARES AT MARCH 29, 2018 SETTLEMENT DATE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
